mods.abstract: Three color window card (black, blue, and silver on light brown) announcing the 5th Annual Nashville River Stages featuring Ani DiFranco, Baha Men, Bo Diddley, Carolyn Dawn Johnson, Counting Crows, Darden Smith, Erykah Badu, Galactic, Garbage, Hoobastank, Incubus, Jack Johnson, Jethro Tull, John Mayer, Jonatha Brooke, Jonathon Long, moe, No Doubt, Pete Yorn, RES, TobyMac, Tommy Castro, the Warren Brothers, and more in downtown Nashville, Tennessee on May 3-5. Poster features a woodcut of a microphone.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
